defines.name: RLAPI
defines.description: We are building the library as a Win32 shared library (.dll)

defines.name: GetMouseRay
defines.description: Compatibility hack for previous raylib versions

aliases.name: Camera
aliases.description: Camera type fallback, defaults to Camera3D

functions.name: InitWindow
functions.description: Initialize window and OpenGL context

functions.name: CloseWindow
functions.description: Close window and unload OpenGL context

functions.name: WindowShouldClose
functions.description: Check if application should close (KEY_ESCAPE pressed or windows close icon clicked)

functions.name: IsWindowReady
functions.description: Check if window has been initialized successfully

functions.name: IsWindowFullscreen
functions.description: Check if window is currently fullscreen

functions.name: IsWindowHidden
functions.description: Check if window is currently hidden (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: IsWindowMinimized
functions.description: Check if window is currently minimized (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: IsWindowMaximized
functions.description: Check if window is currently maximized (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: IsWindowFocused
functions.description: Check if window is currently focused (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: IsWindowResized
functions.description: Check if window has been resized last frame

functions.name: IsWindowState
functions.description: Check if one specific window flag is enabled

functions.name: SetWindowState
functions.description: Set window configuration state using flags (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: ClearWindowState
functions.description: Clear window configuration state flags

functions.name: ToggleFullscreen
functions.description: Toggle window state: fullscreen/windowed (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: ToggleBorderlessWindowed
functions.description: Toggle window state: borderless windowed (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: MaximizeWindow
functions.description: Set window state: maximized, if resizable (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: MinimizeWindow
functions.description: Set window state: minimized, if resizable (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: RestoreWindow
functions.description: Set window state: not minimized/maximized (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: SetWindowIcon
functions.description: Set icon for window (single image, RGBA 32bit, only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: SetWindowIcons
functions.description: Set icon for window (multiple images, RGBA 32bit, only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: SetWindowTitle
functions.description: Set title for window (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP and PLATFORM_WEB)

functions.name: SetWindowPosition
functions.description: Set window position on screen (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: SetWindowMonitor
functions.description: Set monitor for the current window

functions.name: SetWindowMinSize
functions.description: Set window minimum dimensions (for FLAG_WINDOW_RESIZABLE)

functions.name: SetWindowMaxSize
functions.description: Set window maximum dimensions (for FLAG_WINDOW_RESIZABLE)

functions.name: SetWindowSize
functions.description: Set window dimensions

functions.name: SetWindowOpacity
functions.description: Set window opacity [0.0f..1.0f] (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: SetWindowFocused
functions.description: Set window focused (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: GetWindowHandle
functions.description: Get native window handle

functions.name: GetScreenWidth
functions.description: Get current screen width

functions.name: GetScreenHeight
functions.description: Get current screen height

functions.name: GetRenderWidth
functions.description: Get current render width (it considers HiDPI)

functions.name: GetRenderHeight
functions.description: Get current render height (it considers HiDPI)

functions.name: GetMonitorCount
functions.description: Get number of connected monitors

functions.name: GetCurrentMonitor
functions.description: Get current connected monitor

functions.name: GetMonitorPosition
functions.description: Get specified monitor position

functions.name: GetMonitorWidth
functions.description: Get specified monitor width (current video mode used by monitor)

functions.name: GetMonitorHeight
functions.description: Get specified monitor height (current video mode used by monitor)

functions.name: GetMonitorPhysicalWidth
functions.description: Get specified monitor physical width in millimetres

functions.name: GetMonitorPhysicalHeight
functions.description: Get specified monitor physical height in millimetres

functions.name: GetMonitorRefreshRate
functions.description: Get specified monitor refresh rate

functions.name: GetWindowPosition
functions.description: Get window position XY on monitor

functions.name: GetWindowScaleDPI
functions.description: Get window scale DPI factor

functions.name: GetMonitorName
functions.description: Get the human-readable, UTF-8 encoded name of the specified monitor

functions.name: SetClipboardText
functions.description: Set clipboard text content

functions.name: GetClipboardText
functions.description: Get clipboard text content

functions.name: EnableEventWaiting
functions.description: Enable waiting for events on EndDrawing(), no automatic event polling

functions.name: DisableEventWaiting
functions.description: Disable waiting for events on EndDrawing(), automatic events polling

functions.name: ShowCursor
functions.description: Shows cursor

functions.name: HideCursor
functions.description: Hides cursor

functions.name: IsCursorHidden
functions.description: Check if cursor is not visible

functions.name: EnableCursor
functions.description: Enables cursor (unlock cursor)

functions.name: DisableCursor
functions.description: Disables cursor (lock cursor)

functions.name: IsCursorOnScreen
functions.description: Check if cursor is on the screen

functions.name: ClearBackground
functions.description: Set background color (framebuffer clear color)

functions.name: BeginDrawing
functions.description: Setup canvas (framebuffer) to start drawing

functions.name: EndDrawing
functions.description: End canvas drawing and swap buffers (double buffering)

functions.name: BeginMode2D
functions.description: Begin 2D mode with custom camera (2D)

functions.name: EndMode2D
functions.description: Ends 2D mode with custom camera

functions.name: BeginMode3D
functions.description: Begin 3D mode with custom camera (3D)

functions.name: EndMode3D
functions.description: Ends 3D mode and returns to default 2D orthographic mode

functions.name: BeginTextureMode
functions.description: Begin drawing to render texture

functions.name: EndTextureMode
functions.description: Ends drawing to render texture

functions.name: BeginShaderMode
functions.description: Begin custom shader drawing

functions.name: EndShaderMode
functions.description: End custom shader drawing (use default shader)

functions.name: BeginBlendMode
functions.description: Begin blending mode (alpha, additive, multiplied, subtract, custom)

functions.name: EndBlendMode
functions.description: End blending mode (reset to default: alpha blending)

functions.name: BeginScissorMode
functions.description: Begin scissor mode (define screen area for following drawing)

functions.name: EndScissorMode
functions.description: End scissor mode

functions.name: BeginVrStereoMode
functions.description: Begin stereo rendering (requires VR simulator)

functions.name: EndVrStereoMode
functions.description: End stereo rendering (requires VR simulator)

functions.name: LoadVrStereoConfig
functions.description: Load VR stereo config for VR simulator device parameters

functions.name: UnloadVrStereoConfig
functions.description: Unload VR stereo config

functions.name: LoadShader
functions.description: Load shader from files and bind default locations

functions.name: LoadShaderFromMemory
functions.description: Load shader from code strings and bind default locations

functions.name: IsShaderReady
functions.description: Check if a shader is ready

functions.name: GetShaderLocation
functions.description: Get shader uniform location

functions.name: GetShaderLocationAttrib
functions.description: Get shader attribute location

functions.name: SetShaderValue
functions.description: Set shader uniform value

functions.name: SetShaderValueV
functions.description: Set shader uniform value vector

functions.name: SetShaderValueMatrix
functions.description: Set shader uniform value (matrix 4x4)

functions.name: SetShaderValueTexture
functions.description: Set shader uniform value for texture (sampler2d)

functions.name: UnloadShader
functions.description: Unload shader from GPU memory (VRAM)

functions.name: GetScreenToWorldRay
functions.description: Get a ray trace from screen position (i.e mouse)

functions.name: GetScreenToWorldRayEx
functions.description: Get a ray trace from screen position (i.e mouse) in a viewport

functions.name: GetWorldToScreen
functions.description: Get the screen space position for a 3d world space position

functions.name: GetWorldToScreenEx
functions.description: Get size position for a 3d world space position

functions.name: GetWorldToScreen2D
functions.description: Get the screen space position for a 2d camera world space position

functions.name: GetScreenToWorld2D
functions.description: Get the world space position for a 2d camera screen space position

functions.name: GetCameraMatrix
functions.description: Get camera transform matrix (view matrix)

functions.name: GetCameraMatrix2D
functions.description: Get camera 2d transform matrix

functions.name: SetTargetFPS
functions.description: Set target FPS (maximum)

functions.name: GetFrameTime
functions.description: Get time in seconds for last frame drawn (delta time)

functions.name: GetTime
functions.description: Get elapsed time in seconds since InitWindow()

functions.name: GetFPS
functions.description: Get current FPS

functions.name: SwapScreenBuffer
functions.description: Swap back buffer with front buffer (screen drawing)

functions.name: PollInputEvents
functions.description: Register all input events

functions.name: WaitTime
functions.description: Wait for some time (halt program execution)

functions.name: SetRandomSeed
functions.description: Set the seed for the random number generator

functions.name: GetRandomValue
functions.description: Get a random value between min and max (both included)

functions.name: LoadRandomSequence
functions.description: Load random values sequence, no values repeated

functions.name: UnloadRandomSequence
functions.description: Unload random values sequence

functions.name: TakeScreenshot
functions.description: Takes a screenshot of current screen (filename extension defines format)

functions.name: SetConfigFlags
functions.description: Setup init configuration flags (view FLAGS)

functions.name: OpenURL
functions.description: Open URL with default system browser (if available)

functions.name: TraceLog
functions.description: Show trace log messages (LOG_DEBUG, LOG_INFO, LOG_WARNING, LOG_ERROR...)

functions.name: SetTraceLogLevel
functions.description: Set the current threshold (minimum) log level

functions.name: MemAlloc
functions.description: Internal memory allocator

functions.name: MemRealloc
functions.description: Internal memory reallocator

functions.name: MemFree
functions.description: Internal memory free

functions.name: SetTraceLogCallback
functions.description: Set custom trace log

functions.name: SetLoadFileDataCallback
functions.description: Set custom file binary data loader

functions.name: SetSaveFileDataCallback
functions.description: Set custom file binary data saver

functions.name: SetLoadFileTextCallback
functions.description: Set custom file text data loader

functions.name: SetSaveFileTextCallback
functions.description: Set custom file text data saver

functions.name: LoadFileData
functions.description: Load file data as byte array (read)

functions.name: UnloadFileData
functions.description: Unload file data allocated by LoadFileData()

functions.name: SaveFileData
functions.description: Save data to file from byte array (write), returns true on success

functions.name: ExportDataAsCode
functions.description: Export data to code (.h), returns true on success

functions.name: LoadFileText
functions.description: Load text data from file (read), returns a '\0' terminated string

functions.name: UnloadFileText
functions.description: Unload file text data allocated by LoadFileText()

functions.name: SaveFileText
functions.description: Save text data to file (write), string must be '\0' terminated, returns true on success

functions.name: FileExists
functions.description: Check if file exists

functions.name: DirectoryExists
functions.description: Check if a directory path exists

functions.name: IsFileExtension
functions.description: Check file extension (including point: .png, .wav)

functions.name: GetFileLength
functions.description: Get file length in bytes (NOTE: GetFileSize() conflicts with windows.h)

functions.name: GetFileExtension
functions.description: Get pointer to extension for a filename string (includes dot: '.png')

functions.name: GetFileName
functions.description: Get pointer to filename for a path string

functions.name: GetFileNameWithoutExt
functions.description: Get filename string without extension (uses static string)

functions.name: GetDirectoryPath
functions.description: Get full path for a given fileName with path (uses static string)

functions.name: GetPrevDirectoryPath
functions.description: Get previous directory path for a given path (uses static string)

functions.name: GetWorkingDirectory
functions.description: Get current working directory (uses static string)

functions.name: GetApplicationDirectory
functions.description: Get the directory of the running application (uses static string)

functions.name: ChangeDirectory
functions.description: Change working directory, return true on success

functions.name: IsPathFile
functions.description: Check if a given path is a file or a directory

functions.name: IsFileNameValid
functions.description: Check if fileName is valid for the platform/OS

functions.name: LoadDirectoryFiles
functions.description: Load directory filepaths

functions.name: LoadDirectoryFilesEx
functions.description: Load directory filepaths with extension filtering and recursive directory scan

functions.name: UnloadDirectoryFiles
functions.description: Unload filepaths

functions.name: IsFileDropped
functions.description: Check if a file has been dropped into window

functions.name: LoadDroppedFiles
functions.description: Load dropped filepaths

functions.name: UnloadDroppedFiles
functions.description: Unload dropped filepaths

functions.name: GetFileModTime
functions.description: Get file modification time (last write time)

functions.name: CompressData
functions.description: Compress data (DEFLATE algorithm), memory must be MemFree()

functions.name: DecompressData
functions.description: Decompress data (DEFLATE algorithm), memory must be MemFree()

functions.name: EncodeDataBase64
functions.description: Encode data to Base64 string, memory must be MemFree()

functions.name: DecodeDataBase64
functions.description: Decode Base64 string data, memory must be MemFree()

functions.name: LoadAutomationEventList
functions.description: Load automation events list from file, NULL for empty list, capacity = MAX_AUTOMATION_EVENTS

functions.name: UnloadAutomationEventList
functions.description: Unload automation events list from file

functions.name: ExportAutomationEventList
functions.description: Export automation events list as text file

functions.name: SetAutomationEventList
functions.description: Set automation event list to record to

functions.name: SetAutomationEventBaseFrame
functions.description: Set automation event internal base frame to start recording

functions.name: StartAutomationEventRecording
functions.description: Start recording automation events (AutomationEventList must be set)

functions.name: StopAutomationEventRecording
functions.description: Stop recording automation events

functions.name: PlayAutomationEvent
functions.description: Play a recorded automation event

functions.name: IsKeyPressed
functions.description: Check if a key has been pressed once

functions.name: IsKeyPressedRepeat
functions.description: Check if a key has been pressed again (Only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

functions.name: IsKeyDown
functions.description: Check if a key is being pressed

functions.name: IsKeyReleased
functions.description: Check if a key has been released once

functions.name: IsKeyUp
functions.description: Check if a key is NOT being pressed

functions.name: GetKeyPressed
functions.description: Get key pressed (keycode), call it multiple times for keys queued, returns 0 when the queue is empty

functions.name: GetCharPressed
functions.description: Get char pressed (unicode), call it multiple times for chars queued, returns 0 when the queue is empty

functions.name: SetExitKey
functions.description: Set a custom key to exit program (default is ESC)

functions.name: IsGamepadAvailable
functions.description: Check if a gamepad is available

functions.name: GetGamepadName
functions.description: Get gamepad internal name id

functions.name: IsGamepadButtonPressed
functions.description: Check if a gamepad button has been pressed once

functions.name: IsGamepadButtonDown
functions.description: Check if a gamepad button is being pressed

functions.name: IsGamepadButtonReleased
functions.description: Check if a gamepad button has been released once

functions.name: IsGamepadButtonUp
functions.description: Check if a gamepad button is NOT being pressed

functions.name: GetGamepadButtonPressed
functions.description: Get the last gamepad button pressed

functions.name: GetGamepadAxisCount
functions.description: Get gamepad axis count for a gamepad

functions.name: GetGamepadAxisMovement
functions.description: Get axis movement value for a gamepad axis

functions.name: SetGamepadMappings
functions.description: Set internal gamepad mappings (SDL_GameControllerDB)

functions.name: SetGamepadVibration
functions.description: Set gamepad vibration for both motors

functions.name: IsMouseButtonPressed
functions.description: Check if a mouse button has been pressed once

functions.name: IsMouseButtonDown
functions.description: Check if a mouse button is being pressed

functions.name: IsMouseButtonReleased
functions.description: Check if a mouse button has been released once

functions.name: IsMouseButtonUp
functions.description: Check if a mouse button is NOT being pressed

functions.name: GetMouseX
functions.description: Get mouse position X

functions.name: GetMouseY
functions.description: Get mouse position Y

functions.name: GetMousePosition
functions.description: Get mouse position XY

functions.name: GetMouseDelta
functions.description: Get mouse delta between frames

functions.name: SetMousePosition
functions.description: Set mouse position XY

functions.name: SetMouseOffset
functions.description: Set mouse offset

functions.name: SetMouseScale
functions.description: Set mouse scaling

functions.name: GetMouseWheelMove
functions.description: Get mouse wheel movement for X or Y, whichever is larger

functions.name: GetMouseWheelMoveV
functions.description: Get mouse wheel movement for both X and Y

functions.name: SetMouseCursor
functions.description: Set mouse cursor

functions.name: GetTouchX
functions.description: Get touch position X for touch point 0 (relative to screen size)

functions.name: GetTouchY
functions.description: Get touch position Y for touch point 0 (relative to screen size)

functions.name: GetTouchPosition
functions.description: Get touch position XY for a touch point index (relative to screen size)

functions.name: GetTouchPointId
functions.description: Get touch point identifier for given index

functions.name: GetTouchPointCount
functions.description: Get number of touch points

functions.name: SetGesturesEnabled
functions.description: Enable a set of gestures using flags

functions.name: IsGestureDetected
functions.description: Check if a gesture have been detected

functions.name: GetGestureDetected
functions.description: Get latest detected gesture

functions.name: GetGestureHoldDuration
functions.description: Get gesture hold time in milliseconds

functions.name: GetGestureDragVector
functions.description: Get gesture drag vector

functions.name: GetGestureDragAngle
functions.description: Get gesture drag angle

functions.name: GetGesturePinchVector
functions.description: Get gesture pinch delta

functions.name: GetGesturePinchAngle
functions.description: Get gesture pinch angle

functions.name: UpdateCamera
functions.description: Update camera position for selected mode

functions.name: UpdateCameraPro
functions.description: Update camera movement/rotation

functions.name: SetShapesTexture
functions.description: Set texture and rectangle to be used on shapes drawing

functions.name: GetShapesTexture
functions.description: Get texture that is used for shapes drawing

functions.name: GetShapesTextureRectangle
functions.description: Get texture source rectangle that is used for shapes drawing

functions.name: DrawPixel
functions.description: Draw a pixel

functions.name: DrawPixelV
functions.description: Draw a pixel (Vector version)

functions.name: DrawLine
functions.description: Draw a line

functions.name: DrawLineV
functions.description: Draw a line (using gl lines)

functions.name: DrawLineEx
functions.description: Draw a line (using triangles/quads)

functions.name: DrawLineStrip
functions.description: Draw lines sequence (using gl lines)

functions.name: DrawLineBezier
functions.description: Draw line segment cubic-bezier in-out interpolation

functions.name: DrawCircle
functions.description: Draw a color-filled circle

functions.name: DrawCircleSector
functions.description: Draw a piece of a circle

functions.name: DrawCircleSectorLines
functions.description: Draw circle sector outline

functions.name: DrawCircleGradient
functions.description: Draw a gradient-filled circle

functions.name: DrawCircleV
functions.description: Draw a color-filled circle (Vector version)

functions.name: DrawCircleLines
functions.description: Draw circle outline

functions.name: DrawCircleLinesV
functions.description: Draw circle outline (Vector version)

functions.name: DrawEllipse
functions.description: Draw ellipse

functions.name: DrawEllipseLines
functions.description: Draw ellipse outline

functions.name: DrawRing
functions.description: Draw ring

functions.name: DrawRingLines
functions.description: Draw ring outline

functions.name: DrawRectangle
functions.description: Draw a color-filled rectangle

functions.name: DrawRectangleV
functions.description: Draw a color-filled rectangle (Vector version)

functions.name: DrawRectangleRec
functions.description: Draw a color-filled rectangle

functions.name: DrawRectanglePro
functions.description: Draw a color-filled rectangle with pro parameters

functions.name: DrawRectangleGradientV
functions.description: Draw a vertical-gradient-filled rectangle

functions.name: DrawRectangleGradientH
functions.description: Draw a horizontal-gradient-filled rectangle

functions.name: DrawRectangleGradientEx
functions.description: Draw a gradient-filled rectangle with custom vertex colors

functions.name: DrawRectangleLines
functions.description: Draw rectangle outline

functions.name: DrawRectangleLinesEx
functions.description: Draw rectangle outline with extended parameters

functions.name: DrawRectangleRounded
functions.description: Draw rectangle with rounded edges

functions.name: DrawRectangleRoundedLines
functions.description: Draw rectangle lines with rounded edges

functions.name: DrawRectangleRoundedLinesEx
functions.description: Draw rectangle with rounded edges outline

functions.name: DrawTriangle
functions.description: Draw a color-filled triangle (vertex in counter-clockwise order!)

functions.name: DrawTriangleLines
functions.description: Draw triangle outline (vertex in counter-clockwise order!)

functions.name: DrawTriangleFan
functions.description: Draw a triangle fan defined by points (first vertex is the center)

functions.name: DrawTriangleStrip
functions.description: Draw a triangle strip defined by points

functions.name: DrawPoly
functions.description: Draw a regular polygon (Vector version)

functions.name: DrawPolyLines
functions.description: Draw a polygon outline of n sides

functions.name: DrawPolyLinesEx
functions.description: Draw a polygon outline of n sides with extended parameters

functions.name: DrawSplineLinear
functions.description: Draw spline: Linear, minimum 2 points

functions.name: DrawSplineBasis
functions.description: Draw spline: B-Spline, minimum 4 points

functions.name: DrawSplineCatmullRom
functions.description: Draw spline: Catmull-Rom, minimum 4 points

functions.name: DrawSplineBezierQuadratic
functions.description: Draw spline: Quadratic Bezier, minimum 3 points (1 control point): [p1, c2, p3, c4...]

functions.name: DrawSplineBezierCubic
functions.description: Draw spline: Cubic Bezier, minimum 4 points (2 control points): [p1, c2, c3, p4, c5, c6...]

functions.name: DrawSplineSegmentLinear
functions.description: Draw spline segment: Linear, 2 points

functions.name: DrawSplineSegmentBasis
functions.description: Draw spline segment: B-Spline, 4 points

functions.name: DrawSplineSegmentCatmullRom
functions.description: Draw spline segment: Catmull-Rom, 4 points

functions.name: DrawSplineSegmentBezierQuadratic
functions.description: Draw spline segment: Quadratic Bezier, 2 points, 1 control point

functions.name: DrawSplineSegmentBezierCubic
functions.description: Draw spline segment: Cubic Bezier, 2 points, 2 control points

functions.name: GetSplinePointLinear
functions.description: Get (evaluate) spline point: Linear

functions.name: GetSplinePointBasis
functions.description: Get (evaluate) spline point: B-Spline

functions.name: GetSplinePointCatmullRom
functions.description: Get (evaluate) spline point: Catmull-Rom

functions.name: GetSplinePointBezierQuad
functions.description: Get (evaluate) spline point: Quadratic Bezier

functions.name: GetSplinePointBezierCubic
functions.description: Get (evaluate) spline point: Cubic Bezier

functions.name: CheckCollisionRecs
functions.description: Check collision between two rectangles

functions.name: CheckCollisionCircles
functions.description: Check collision between two circles

functions.name: CheckCollisionCircleRec
functions.description: Check collision between circle and rectangle

functions.name: CheckCollisionPointRec
functions.description: Check if point is inside rectangle

functions.name: CheckCollisionPointCircle
functions.description: Check if point is inside circle

functions.name: CheckCollisionPointTriangle
functions.description: Check if point is inside a triangle

functions.name: CheckCollisionPointPoly
functions.description: Check if point is within a polygon described by array of vertices

functions.name: CheckCollisionLines
functions.description: Check the collision between two lines defined by two points each, returns collision point by reference

functions.name: CheckCollisionPointLine
functions.description: Check if point belongs to line created between two points [p1] and [p2] with defined margin in pixels [threshold]

functions.name: CheckCollisionCircleLine
functions.description: Check if circle collides with a line created betweeen two points [p1] and [p2]

functions.name: GetCollisionRec
functions.description: Get collision rectangle for two rectangles collision

functions.name: LoadImage
functions.description: Load image from file into CPU memory (RAM)

functions.name: LoadImageRaw
functions.description: Load image from RAW file data

functions.name: LoadImageSvg
functions.description: Load image from SVG file data or string with specified size

functions.name: LoadImageAnim
functions.description: Load image sequence from file (frames appended to image.data)

functions.name: LoadImageAnimFromMemory
functions.description: Load image sequence from memory buffer

functions.name: LoadImageFromMemory
functions.description: Load image from memory buffer, fileType refers to extension: i.e. '.png'

functions.name: LoadImageFromTexture
functions.description: Load image from GPU texture data

functions.name: LoadImageFromScreen
functions.description: Load image from screen buffer and (screenshot)

functions.name: IsImageReady
functions.description: Check if an image is ready

functions.name: UnloadImage
functions.description: Unload image from CPU memory (RAM)

functions.name: ExportImage
functions.description: Export image data to file, returns true on success

functions.name: ExportImageToMemory
functions.description: Export image to memory buffer

functions.name: ExportImageAsCode
functions.description: Export image as code file defining an array of bytes, returns true on success

functions.name: GenImageColor
functions.description: Generate image: plain color

functions.name: GenImageGradientLinear
functions.description: Generate image: linear gradient, direction in degrees [0..360], 0=Vertical gradient

functions.name: GenImageGradientRadial
functions.description: Generate image: radial gradient

functions.name: GenImageGradientSquare
functions.description: Generate image: square gradient

functions.name: GenImageChecked
functions.description: Generate image: checked

functions.name: GenImageWhiteNoise
functions.description: Generate image: white noise

functions.name: GenImagePerlinNoise
functions.description: Generate image: perlin noise

functions.name: GenImageCellular
functions.description: Generate image: cellular algorithm, bigger tileSize means bigger cells

functions.name: GenImageText
functions.description: Generate image: grayscale image from text data

functions.name: ImageCopy
functions.description: Create an image duplicate (useful for transformations)

functions.name: ImageFromImage
functions.description: Create an image from another image piece

functions.name: ImageText
functions.description: Create an image from text (default font)

functions.name: ImageTextEx
functions.description: Create an image from text (custom sprite font)

functions.name: ImageFormat
functions.description: Convert image data to desired format

functions.name: ImageToPOT
functions.description: Convert image to POT (power-of-two)

functions.name: ImageCrop
functions.description: Crop an image to a defined rectangle

functions.name: ImageAlphaCrop
functions.description: Crop image depending on alpha value

functions.name: ImageAlphaClear
functions.description: Clear alpha channel to desired color

functions.name: ImageAlphaMask
functions.description: Apply alpha mask to image

functions.name: ImageAlphaPremultiply
functions.description: Premultiply alpha channel

functions.name: ImageBlurGaussian
functions.description: Apply Gaussian blur using a box blur approximation

functions.name: ImageKernelConvolution
functions.description: Apply Custom Square image convolution kernel

functions.name: ImageResize
functions.description: Resize image (Bicubic scaling algorithm)

functions.name: ImageResizeNN
functions.description: Resize image (Nearest-Neighbor scaling algorithm)

functions.name: ImageResizeCanvas
functions.description: Resize canvas and fill with color

functions.name: ImageMipmaps
functions.description: Compute all mipmap levels for a provided image

functions.name: ImageDither
functions.description: Dither image data to 16bpp or lower (Floyd-Steinberg dithering)

functions.name: ImageFlipVertical
functions.description: Flip image vertically

functions.name: ImageFlipHorizontal
functions.description: Flip image horizontally

functions.name: ImageRotate
functions.description: Rotate image by input angle in degrees (-359 to 359)

functions.name: ImageRotateCW
functions.description: Rotate image clockwise 90deg

functions.name: ImageRotateCCW
functions.description: Rotate image counter-clockwise 90deg

functions.name: ImageColorTint
functions.description: Modify image color: tint

functions.name: ImageColorInvert
functions.description: Modify image color: invert

functions.name: ImageColorGrayscale
functions.description: Modify image color: grayscale

functions.name: ImageColorContrast
functions.description: Modify image color: contrast (-100 to 100)
